item.name: CB Activity
item.description:
Add Activity stream to showcase membership participation on your profiles and your site.

* Select Activity module for easy activity showcasing.

item.name: CB Blogs
item.description: Add easy blogging to profiles. Stored as Joomla content, K2 content or using internal storage.

item.name: CB ProfileGallery
item.description:
Get a gallery tab with quota system for users to upload images and files.

* Select ProfileGallery module for easy activity showcasing.

item.name: CB ProfileBook
item.description:
Get guestbook, wall and blog tabs and rating for user profiles.

* Select ProfileBook module for easy activity showcasing.

item.name: CB Forums
item.description: Use this advanced forum plugin to integrate even further with the Kunena forum extension.

item.name: CB Latest Views
item.description: Let members see who has visited their profile. Inspires user interaction.

item.name: CB Profile Update Logger
item.description: Log profile changes and send change notifications to your moderators.

item.name: CB Articles
item.description: Use this advanced Articles plugin to show the member's Joomla or K2 articles in a tab.

item.name: CB Antispam
item.description: Add Captcha challenge to CB forms to protect against spamming. Built-in blocking and parallel session limits functionality.

item.name: CB Conditionals
item.description: Conditionaly hide or show fields and tabs based on other field values.

item.name: CB Auto Actions
item.description: Execute automated actions based on profile events. Great tool with many uses.

item.name: CB Template Changer
item.description: Let your users select which CB template their profile should use.

item.name: CB AutoWelcome
item.description: Send personalized welcoming message or email to new users.

item.name: CB Google Translate
item.description: Translate your website pages using Google Translate in your CB Login module.

item.name: CB Connect
item.description: Let users to join your website using Facebook, Twitter, Google+, Linkedin or MS Live.

item.name: CB Facebook Connect
item.description: This plugin has been discontinued and you should download and use the CB Connect plugin that has many more features and is now available to Advanced members also.

item.name: CB Twitter Connect
item.description: This plugin has been discontinued and you should download and use the CB Connect plugin that has many more features and is now available to Advanced members also.

item.name: CB Invites
item.description: Let users invite their friends to your website with uniquely generated invite codes.

item.name: CB Privacy
item.description: Let users specify privacy levels for their CB field data and CB Tabs.

item.name: CB Core Ajax field
item.description: Adds Ajax frontend editing to any CB core field type.

item.name: CB Verify Email
item.description: Verifies email entries with a second entry box, just like password field.

item.name: CB Password Strength
item.description: Adds Password Strength meter to password field to promote secure passwords.

item.name: CB Progress field
item.description: Adds new Progress field type to create profile completeness percentage field.

item.name: CB Email Confirmation
item.description: Reconfirm email address during email field update process.

item.name: CB Video field
item.description: Let users share their videos from Youtube, Vimeo, etc. on their user profiles.

item.name: CB Rating field
item.description: Add Ajax powered CB Rating fields to your profiles.

item.name: CB Ajax Text field
item.description: Add Ajax text fields to your profiles. Great for profile status updates. Provides member status display style.

item.name: CB Ajax File field
item.description: Give your users an Ajax powered file field. Great for resume profile posting.

item.name: CB Gravatar field
item.description: Let your users show their Gravater image on their profile.

item.name: CB Ajax Points field
item.description: Add Ajax +/- integer points field to user profiles. Many uses.

item.name: CB Query field
item.description: Show SQL query results as CB fields on your user profiles. Very powerful concept.

item.name: CB Database Lookup field
item.description: Add a database validated field that can lock registration for specific codes only.

item.name: CB Bootstrap Template
item.description: CB template that adds bootstrap styling to profiles and plugins.

item.name: CB MyCommunity Template
item.description: CB template that is part of the MyCommunity template package.

item.name: CB Coolness Template
item.description: CB template that is part of the Coolness template package.

item.name: CB Funlite Template
item.description: CB template that is part of the Funlite template package.

item.name: CB Flexistrap Template
item.description: CB template that is part of the Flexistrap template package.

item.name: CB GroupJive Main
item.description: Adds powerful common interest group functionality to your website.

item.name: GroupJive Wall
item.description: Add common posting wall for groups.

item.name: GroupJive Photo
item.description: Add photo and image sharing for groups.

item.name: GroupJive Video
item.description: Add video sharing for groups.

item.name: GroupJive File
item.description: Add file sharing for groups.

item.name: GroupJive Events
item.description: Add events with Google map location support for groups.

item.name: GroupJive Forums
item.description: Add private forums Kunena discussions for groups.

item.name: GroupJive Auto
item.description: On the fly automatic group creation and user group joining based on field criteria.

item.name: GroupJive About
item.description: Add descriptions to your user groups.

item.name: GroupJive English
item.description: Customize language strings for frontend and backend of GroupJive.

item.name: CBSubs Main (CB Paid Subscriptions)
item.description:
The main CBSubs - Paid Subscriptions Membership Management Solution plugin.

* Includes Paypal, Authorize.net, Ogone, Swiss PostFinance, Offline and Dummy gateways.

item.name: CBSubs Content Protection
item.description: Protect articles, component access, menus and modules requiring plan subscription.

item.name: CBSubs Tax
item.description: Add sales tax VAT calculations to your sales process.

item.name: CBSubs Promotions
item.description: Add coupon discounts and smart promotions to your sales process.

item.name: CBSubs Mailer
item.description: Create automated personalized marketing email campaigns based on flexible date and field criteria.

item.name: CBSubs Email
item.description: Email subscribers upon specific plan events, like subscription activation and expiration.

item.name: CB Tab/Field Protection
item.description: Show or hide any CB Tab/Field based on subscriptions of owner and of viewer.

item.name: CBSubs CB Field Actions
item.description: Modify CB Field values based on subscription events.

item.name: CBSubs Plan Image field
item.description: Give subscribers a profile image field to visualize their subscription.

item.name: CBSubs GroupJive Integration
item.description: Add and remove users to/from GroupJive groups when subscription starts/ends.

item.name: CBSubs SQL Actions
item.description: Excetute SQL database statements when subscription starts or ends.

item.name: CBSubs URL Execution
item.description: Execute URL scripts passing values from CB field data as script parameters.

item.name: CBSubs Piwik Integration
item.description: Use Piwik Analytics to track your CBSubs ecommerce goals.

item.name: CBSubs Google Analytics Integration
item.description: Use Google Analytics to track your CBSubs pages and sales.

item.name: CBSubs PostAffiliatePro Integration
item.description: Record affiliate saled into a PostAffiliatePro installation.

item.name: CBSubs iDevAffiliate3 Integration
item.description: Record affiliate sales into a iDevAffiliate3 installation.

item.name: CBSubs DOCman Integration
item.description: Add/remove subscribers to/from DOCman groups to manage subscription downloads.

item.name: CBSubs Remository Integration
item.description: Add/remove subscribers to/from Remository groups to manage subscription downloads.

item.name: CBSubs AcyMailing Integration
item.description: Add and remove subscribers to AcyMailing extension newsletter lists.

item.name: CBSubs Virtuemart Integration
item.description:
Add/remove subscribers to/from Virtuemart extensions shopping groups.

* Virtuemart 1.x and 2.x supported.

item.name: CBSubs jAwards Integration
item.description: Give users jAwards extension based badges based on subscriptions.

item.name: CBSubs Eventlist Integration
item.description: Add users to Eventlist extension events based on their subscriptions.

item.name: CBSubs AlphaUserPoints Integration
item.description: Give AlphaUserPoints extension points to your subscribers.

item.name: CBSubs Folder Access Protection
item.description: Protect any apache/linux server based folder and require subscription for access.

item.name: CBSubs Rounded Template
item.description: Use or modify our Joomlapolis Rounded template to present your CBSubs items.

item.name: CBSubs English Language
item.description: Use as basis to localize CBSubs to your language or to adjust English language texts.

item.name: CBSubs 2CheckOut
item.description: Use the 2CheckOut payment organization for your sales.

item.name: CBSubs Paypal Pro
item.description: Use the Paypal Pro payment method for your sales.

item.name: CBSubs Google Checkout
item.description: Use the Google Checkout payment method for your sales.

item.name: CBSubs WorldPay
item.description: Use the WorldPay payment organization for your sales.

item.name: CBSubs CCBill
item.description: Use the CCBill payment organization for your sales.

item.name: CBSubs CIC Credit Mutuel
item.description: Use the CIC Credit Mutuel payment organization for your sales.

item.name: CBSubs Moneris eSELECT plus
item.description: Use the Moneris eSELECT plus payment organization for your sales.

item.name: CBSubs QuickPay
item.description: Use the QuickPay payment organization for your sales.

item.name: CBSubs eWay
item.description: Use the eWay payment organization for your sales.

item.name: CBSubs Payza
item.description: Use the Payza (formerly AlertPay) payment organization for your sales.

item.name: CBSubs Telemoney Easypay
item.description: Use the Telemoney Easypay payment organization for your sales.

item.name: Community Builder Component
item.description: This is the core CB component that includes the framework needed by all CB plugins.

item.description: This is the core CB component that includes the framework needed by all CB plugins.

item.name: Community Builder Component
item.description: This is the core CB component that includes the framework needed by all CB plugins.

item.name: CB Login module
item.description: This module replaces the Joomla login module.

item.name: CB Admin Navigation
item.description: Quickly navigate to major CB solution areas with drop-down menus.

item.name: CB Online module
item.description: Replaces Joomla online module and links users to their profiles.

item.name: CB Workflows
item.description: Let your CB moderators manage approvals from frontend of your website.

item.name: CB Content module
item.description: Add custom HTML with CB field data using this Joomla module.

item.name: CB ProfileBook module
item.description: Showcase CB ProfileBook activity using this module.

item.name: CB ProfileGallery module
item.description: Showcase CB ProfileGallery activity using this module.

item.name: CB Activity module
